metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Safety Dance has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: The Safety Dance has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Mixolydian, F Dorian,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
